description:
Earth is targeted by evil! Who will confront this evil?! "Final Battle of the Glassy Empire!" Change, Kirarin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gekijouban Koutetsu Kouen Kirarin Robo: Kessen! Glassy Teikoku - Yokokuhen
